add_tool.title: Add Custom Tool
add_tool.description:
Create a Python function that the AI can call.

`hass` — HomeAssistant instance (services, states, etc.)
`params` — dict of arguments from the AI
Return a dict, list, or string.

Tip: Use `async_get_clientsession(hass)` for HTTP requests.

{test_result}
